title: complications on DSO implementation on 7 scenes dataset (heads)
body:
Respected @samarth-robo Sir,

With due Respect I just want to ask one basic question that How can I able to exlude relative poses by running [`DSO`](https://github.com/JakobEngel/dso) algorithem.

I used this **camera calibration files** in their algorithm as below.

`0.914 1.218 0.5 0.5 0`
`640 480`
`crop`
`640 480`

**which meant to be in that format**
Calibration File for Pre-Rectified Images
`Pinhole fx fy cx cy 0`
`in_width in_height`
`"crop" / "full" / "none" / "fx fy cx cy 0"`
`out_width out_height`

I gave `7scenes/heads/seq1` folder to dso as input which includes 0-999 color images.

The DSO algorithm gives me 290 camera poses in `results.txt `file in a format of ` ([timestamp x y z qx qy qz qw]` 

And I observed that you used same DSO algorithm and exclude 12-999 poses as shown in this 
[link](https://github.com/NVlabs/geomapnet/blob/master/data/7Scenes/heads/dso_poses/seq-01.txt)

I want this same exact as it is to run the mapnet++ for my own dataset but on 7 scenes or any dataset when I run that DSO, it gave me less poses info of few images instead of poses of every corresponding images.

I dont understand that for `7scenes/heads/seq-1 ` after passing **1000** images, I just get **290** poses, where are the remaining poses? and these 290 poses are of whose images.?

please help me to resolve it.

I will be thankful to you.

Best Regards
